K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:318a-5: byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul bstan pa thams cad ston pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:318a-6: sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:318a-8: sgra skad thams cad kyi brda zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:318a-10: byang chub sems dpa' sgra skad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:318a-12: brda thams cad rtogs shing yi ge thams cad kyis yi ge gcig ston pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:318a-13: yi ge gcig gis yi ge thams cad ston par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:318a-15: las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:318a-16: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad gsog cing ston par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:318a-18: byang chub sems dpa' cang mi smra bar snyoms par zhugs te yi ge gcig tsam yang mi brjod par sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:318a-22: rang sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:318b-0: byang chub sems @318b dpa'i sgra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:318b-1: pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra thos par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:318b-3: gzungs thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:318b-5: byang chub sems dpa' gzungs mtha' yas pa sgrub pa la 'jug pa khong du chud par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:318b-7: chos thams cad la spobs pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:318b-9: byang chub sems dpa' yi ge thams cad la spobs shing sgra skad thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:318b-11: brjod pa thams cad la yang spobs par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:318b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:318b-14: bdag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i yon tan brjod pa'i khyad par la spobs lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:318b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:318b-20: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag nem nur ma mchis pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:318b-21: the tshom ma mchis pa'i sems kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:318b-24: kun chub par bgyid pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:319a-0: gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par bgyid pa de tshe 'di nyid la gdon mi 'tshal bar @319a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:319a-1: spobs pa thob par re bar bgyi ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:319a-3: spobs pa rgya che ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:319a-4: zab mo la spobs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:319a-5: mi brjed pa'i spobs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:319a-6: spobs pa sna tshogs pa thob par re bar bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:319a-8: sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa ma mchis pa'i sems su 'gyur bar re bar bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:319a-9: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:319a-10: gang ji tsam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sgrub pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:319a-11: spyod pa 'di nyid dang rjes su 'brel ba lags pa'i slad du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:319a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:319a-17: khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:319a-22: longs spyod chen po thob par slu ba med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:319a-24: mtho ris su skye bar slu ba med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:319a-26: shes rab chen por 'gyur bar slu ba med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:319a-28: 'bral bar 'gyur bar slu ba med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:319a-30: de bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang tshe 'di nyid la spobs pa skye bar slu bar med do; ;'jam dpal /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:319a-34: mun pa mun nag thams cad sel bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:319b-0: de bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs @319b 'di yang bstan ma thag tu spobs pa skye bar re bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:319b-4: byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:319b-5: nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:319b-7: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu 'don pa de yang the tshom med par nges par tshe 'di nyid la spobs pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:319b-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe 'di nyid la spobs pa thob par 'dod pas nem nur med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:319b-11: the tshom med pa'i sems kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:319b-12: bcang bar bya; kha ton du bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:319b-15: gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:319b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med pa'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:319b-18: bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas byang chub sems dpa' gang nem nur ma mchis pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:319b-19: the tshom ma mchis pa'i sems kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:320a-3: kun chub par bgyi ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:320a-4: gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ba de la spobs pa nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:320a-5: de nas bdud sdig can du zhing smres sngags 'don bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song sten phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:320a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:320a-8: thugs rje dang ldan zhing sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams la bde ba rab tu stsol ba lags na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:320a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi yid mi bde ba de legs par bsal ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di slar zhing byin gyis mi brlab tu gsol /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:320a-11: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:320a-12: da ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe bdag 'dir shin tu cher sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:320a-13: mya ngan gyi zug rdus gzir bar gyur lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:320b-0: tha na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can gang dag gi rna lam du grag par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang @320b dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog par 'gyur lags na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:320b-1: gang dag gis thos nas 'dzin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:320b-4: kun chub par bgyid pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:320b-5: gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par bgyid pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:320b-6: sems can de dag thams cad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:320b-7: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:320b-9: de'i slad du bdag gi bdud kyi gnas stong par 'gyur lags na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:320b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:320b-11: thugs rje dang ldan zhing sdug bsngal ba rnams la bde ba stsol ba lags na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:320b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:320b-19: sems can thams cad kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:320b-21: nga yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la byin gyis rlob par mi byed kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:321a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs dbyung ba mdzad pas bdud sdig can tshim zhing dga' la yid rangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:321a-3: rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:321a-4: yid bde ba skyes nas de nyid du mi snang par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:321a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to; ;bcom ldan 'das /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:321a-6: ci las dgongs te 'di skad du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:321a-7: nga chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la byin gyis rlob par mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:321a-8: zhes bdud sdig can la bka' stsal; bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:321a-11: byin gyi rlabs med pas byin gyis brlabs pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:321a-12: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang byin gyi rlabs med pas byin gyis brlabs pa yin pas 'jam dpal /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:321a-13: de'i phyir ngas bdud sdig can la 'di skad du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:321a-14: nga chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la byin gyis rlob par mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:321a-18: bden pa'i tshig gang gis chos thams cad byin gyi rlabs med pas byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:321a-19: tha dad du dbyer med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:321b-2: yang dag par mtha' dang mnyam pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:321b-3: de bzhin nyid du zhugs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:321b-4: chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid yin pa'i bden pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:321b-5: bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzam bu'i sling na rab tu spyod par gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:321b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs de mdzad nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:321b-8: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gang yin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:321b-9: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang yin pa de dag ni; mnyam pa'i phyir khyod kyis kun nas sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zungs shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:321b-13: gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:321b-17: kun nas sgo'i chos kyi dbyings 'di legs par thugs su chud nas sems can rnams la chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong ston par mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:321b-20: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par srung pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:321b-22: legs par kun chub par gyis shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:322a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med pa'i @322a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:322a-2: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:322a-3: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:322a-7: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:322a-8: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las; kun nas sgo'i le'u zhes bya ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:322a-10: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang su rendra po dhi dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-005:322a-11: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bandhe ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa /
